title: Large Statue of Osiris
description: Crudely carved figure of Osiris as a mummified figure made of a soft wood. Hollow.
dimensions:
37.1479Ea - figure: 21 x 6 5/16 x 3 1/8 in. (53.4 x 16 x 8 cm)
37.1479Eb - rear fragment: 13 3/16 x 4 15/16 x 1 3/8 in. (33.5 x 12.5 x 3.5 cm)
37.1479Ec - base: 2 5/8 x 4 9/16 x 10 1/2 in. (6.7 x 11.6 x 26.7 cm)
cavity - diameter on top - 7cm
diameter on bottom - 6.1cm
length of cavity - 34cm
diameter of capity opening at bottom - 5.8cm

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

rights_type.name: Creative Commons 3D
rights_type.description: You may download and use Brooklyn Museum images of this three-dimensional work in accordance with a Creative Commons license. For more information about the Museum's rights project, including how rights types are assigned, please see our blog posts on copyright. If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

completeness.name: Good
completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.

collections.name: Egyptian, Classical, Ancient Near Eastern Art
